description:
The commit 1523fab5ee465df096b2c76d27b634c1f52aca77  causes the unit tests to leave behind a folder when running nova.tests.test_libvirt.



$ git status
# On branch master
# Untracked files:
#   (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)
#
#       nova/tests/nova.compute.manager/
nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
title: Unit tests leave a folder behind:   nova/tests/nova.compute.manager/
